p: Male BALB/c mice (6 weeks old, 20 g of weight) ( n = 50 mice) were purchased from Theodor Bilharz Research Institute (Giza, Egypt). Research procedures were conducted in compliance with the principles and recommendations of the Guide for the Care and Use of Laboratory Animals Association, A.V.M. (2007) [ 36]. All animal experiments were approved by the research ethics committee of the Faculty of Pharmacy, Cairo University, protocol identification code (MI2002); date of approval: 30 May 2017.
